name: castable-video
description: Cast your video element to the big screen with ease!

scripts.publish-release: npm --no-git-tag-version version ${1} && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md && VERSION=$(npm pkg get version | sed 's/"//g') && git commit -m "docs(CHANGELOG): $VERSION" && npm --allow-same-version version $VERSION -m "chore(release): %s" && git push --follow-tags && conventional-github-releaser -p angular -r 0 && npm publish

author: @muxinc
